title: Motorola’s “Satellite Link” hotspot lets you send messages via outer space

description: Outbreak among Mass. swim teams spread to a Rhode Island team after a meet.

title: YouTube scammer who stole millions in song royalties sentenced to 5 years
description: YouTube scammer aggressively defended fake rights to 50,000 songs over 5 years.

description: We now have strong evidence that the Milky Way is a source of high-energy neutrinos.

title: NANOGrav hears “hum” of gravitational wave background, louder than expected
description: Exotic stars called millisecond pulsars serve as celestial metronomes.
